gen_setup: name of the generation to use. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 'vali'
name_match_str: string to search for models when in pure sampling mode. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: '*weak30k[7]'

clip_denoised: Whether to clip denoised samples to [0,1] range. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: true
num_timesteps: Number of timesteps to use for sampling. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 100
guidance_weight: Weight of classifier free diffusion guidance, 0.0 for No guidance. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.0
guidance_kwargs: Keyword arguments which are passed to the guidance forward pass, empty for none. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
eval_batch_size: Batch size for evaluation. 0 for same as train. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 0
sampler_type: Type of sampler to use. One of ['ddpm','ddim']. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 'ddpm'
self_cond: Whether to use self conditioning. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: false
ema_model_rate: EMA model rate to use for sampling. 0 for no EMA (normal model). TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 0
split: Dataset split to use for sampling. One of ['train','vali','test']. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 'vali'
kwargs_mode: How to get kwargs for the model forward pass. One of ['train']. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 'train'

do_agg: Whether to use matplotlib 'agg' as backend for plotting (to avoid memory leak). TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: true
progress_bar: Whether to show a progress bar for batches. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: true
progress_bar_timestep: Whether to show a second progress bar running over timesteps during sampling. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: false
save_raw_inter: Whether to save raw intermediate samples. Needs save_raw_samples==true to have an effect. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: false
save_raw_samples: Whether to save raw samples. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: false
return_samples: Whether to return samples. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: false
remove_old: Should old plots matching the format and in the same folder of newly produced ones be removed? TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: false
plotting_functions: Which plotting functions to use. Comma seperated string of zero or more of ['grid','inter']. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 'grid,inter'

num_votes: Number of votes (segmentation masks) to use per image when sampling. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 5
num_samples: Number of samples (unique images) to produce votes for. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 8
num_inter_steps: Number of unique intermediate steps to save for saving/plotting (limited by num_timesteps also). TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 10
num_inter_samples: Number of intermediate samples to save for saving/plotting. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 8
num_grid_samples: Number of samples to use for a grid plot. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 8
inter_votes_per_sample: How many votes per image (e.g. 1=only first vote) should intermediate steps be saved for. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 1

save_plot_grid_path: Place to save grid plot. Empty string saves in default save folder. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
save_plot_inter_path: Place to save intermediate plot. Empty string saves in default save folder. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
save_raw_samples_path: Place to save raw samples. Empty string saves in default save folder. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
save_concat_plot_inter_path: Place to save concatenated intermediate plot. Empty string saves in default save folder. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
default_save_folder: Default folder to save samples in, as a relative path wrt. the model save_path. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 'samples'
